name: Ruination Chain
description:
My short and simple game for the Godot Wild Jam 12.

Use Q, W and E to match an objects combination in order to destroy it.
Try to keep a combo chain going for as long as you're able to and get the highest score possible!
Press M to toggle music on and off.

Chain and Destruction was my choice for this game. 

The theme was:

Pick at least 2 out of the 3 words below. You may use all 3 if you wish, but you must use at least 2.
Chain | Destruction | Harvest

Art, music, sound effects and coding by Vanne.
